On October 21, 2025, the Future of Life Institute released an open letter titled “[Statement on Superintelligence](https://superintelligence-statement.org/)”, calling for a global ban on the development of superintelligent AI systems until a consensus on their safety is reached.

The letter was signed by over 700 notable figures, including Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak, Richard Branson, AI “godfather” Geoffrey Hinton, and Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.

The authors warn of existential risks, from mass job loss and erosion of freedoms to potential threats to civilization itself, echoing the concerns previously raised by OpenAI CEO Sam Altman.

💊 **DeepSomatic: Google’s AI for Cancer Diagnostics**

Google Research and the University of California[ have unveiled](https://research.google/blog/using-ai-to-identify-genetic-variants-in-tumors-with-deepsomatic/?utm_source=perplexity) DeepSomatic, an open-source deep learning model for detecting somatic mutations in tumors. The study was published in Nature Biotechnology.

The system significantly improves the accuracy of cancer gene variant detection for personalized treatment — reaching 90% accuracy on Illumina data and 80% on PacBio, outperforming traditional tools like MuTect2 and Strelka2. DeepSomatic works across all major sequencing platforms and even supports tumor-only samples, helping accelerate the development of targeted therapies.

[🧠 AI Toolbox Daily | Best AI tools](https://t.me/+bx8eoQcSAElhZjdi)
translated_caption: Wah, ada berita baik ni! Google ada buat model AI baru untuk bantu kesan mutasi dalam tumor. Model ni macam boleh tingkatkan ketepatan dalam mengenal pasti varian gen kanser, jadi rawatan boleh lebih tepat dan peribadi. Lebih kurang macam tu lah, teknologi makin canggih kan?
